rumination.description: Excessive overthinking without movement toward action.
signals: I don’t know what to do
rumination.suggested_action: Identify the smallest physical step you can take in the next 5 minutes.

avoidance.description: Avoiding a task despite knowing it matters.
avoidance.suggested_action: Start with a 5-minute version of the task.

perfectionism.description: Delay caused by fear of doing something imperfectly.
signals: I want to do it properly
perfectionism.suggested_action: Define what ‘good enough for now’ looks like.

fear_of_wrong_choice.description: Hesitation due to fear of making the wrong decision.
signals: What if this is the wrong move
I don’t want to mess up
fear_of_wrong_choice.suggested_action: Choose the reversible option and test it.

urgency_panic.description: Feeling overwhelmed by perceived time pressure.
urgency_panic.suggested_action: Pick one task that reduces pressure the most.

imposter_syndrome.suggested_action: Act as the role for the next 10 minutes.

emotional_overload.description: High emotional activation interfering with action.
emotional_overload.suggested_action: Take 3 slow breaths before choosing the next step.
